attachments.name: Sprint 27: Payconnect 2.0 Terminal - Terminal Configuration #TC_001 - Error Logs

fullName: test/specs/terminal-config/TC_001.e2e.js#Sprint 27: Payconnect 2.0 Terminal - Terminal Configuration.TC_001: Optional Feature - Sale should be displayed in the menu when the Sale feature is enabled.
description:
The system should display the Sale option in the menu when the Sale feature is enabled.

### Preconditions
1. The terminal is connected to a stable internet connection.
2. The terminal has no recorded transactions, or all transactions have been settled.
3. The Sale feature is enabled in the Payconnect Portal.
